mapper.insert:
insert into product values(null, #{code}, #{name}, #{completeCategory}, #{material}, #{description}, #{detailDescription}, #{supplyPrice}, #{consumerPrice}, #{manufacturer}, #{supplier}, #{home}, #{manufactureDate}, #{restockCheck},#{purchaseCount}, #{displayCheck}, #{saleCheck}, #{hits}, #{preferenceScore}, #{postPriority}, now(), #{categoryNo});
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: select no, code, name, complete_category, material, description, detail_description, supply_price, consumer_price, manufacturer, supplier, home, manufacture_date, restock_check, purchase_count, display_check, sale_check, hits, preference_score, post_priority, reg_date, category_no from product where no = #{productNo}

select no, code, name, option, main_image_path as 'mainImagePath', amount, stock_check as 'stockCheck', additional_fee as 'additionalFee', price, product_no as 'productNo' from displayed_product where product_no = #{productNo}

select count(no) from product
where name like '%${keyword}%'
where category_no = #{categoryNo} and name like '%${keyword}%'

select a.no, a.name, a.consumer_price as 'consumerPrice', a.display_check as 'displayCheck', a.sale_check as 'saleCheck', a.complete_category as 'completeCategory', a.reg_date as 'regDate', b.image_path as 'mainImage' from product a, image b
where a.no = b.product_no and b.main_image_check = 'Y'
and a.name like '%${keyword}%'
and a.category_no = #{categoryNo} and a.name like '%${keyword}%'
order by a.no desc limit #{showProductNum} offset #{startPageNum}
mapper.update: update product set name=#{name}, material=#{material}, description=#{description}, detail_description = #{detailDescription}, supply_price = #{supplyPrice}, consumer_price =#{consumerPrice}, manufacturer=#{manufacturer}, supplier=#{supplier}, home=#{home}, manufacture_date =#{manufactureDate}, restock_check =#{restockCheck} , purchase_count =#{purchaseCount}, display_check =#{displayCheck}, sale_check =#{saleCheck}, hits =#{hits}, preference_score =#{preferenceScore}, post_priority =#{postPriority}, category_no =#{categoryNo} where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete from displayed_product where product_no = #{productNo] and option like concat('%',#{optionValue},'%')
